name: RAIFSITTIA: Royal Army invaded my forest so I turn them into animals
name_original: RAIFSITTIA: Royal Army invaded my forest so I turn them into animals
description:
You play as the the witch of the forest. You have been terrorizing the villagers near by so the king decided to send his Royal Army. You going to show them why they shouldn't have enter your territory.

We didn't have time to include some music.

Game made with Godot for the Godot Wild Jam #33

Controls

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Left Click to shoot

Credits

Rafagars - Lead Programmer

Dash2- Programmer

Terrashii - Art & SFX
